text: Health Promotion Board (Abbr.: HPB; Malay: Lembaga Penggalakan Kesihatan, Chinese: 新加坡保健促进局) is a statutory board under the Ministry of Health. This board has been established in 2001, and it is responsible in national health promotion and disease prevention programmes in Singapore. == Other websites == * Category:2000s establishments in Singapore Category:2001 establishments in Asia Category:Organizations based in Singapore
title: Health Promotion Board
